import React from "react" import './AboutUsCard.css'; function AboutUsCard() { return ( <>

What is the WAI 262 Claim about

The basic aspiration of the claim has often been coined by the phrase “Māori control over things Māori”.

What is its purpose?

The claim essentially seeks to restore “tino rangatiratanga” (full authority and self‐determination) of the whānau, hapū and iwi of Aotearoa over our “taonga” (those things and values which we treasure, both intangible and tangible).

); } export default AboutUsCard
